checklists-confirm-change-status: Are you sure you want to change the status of this checklist item? This will create a new revision of the page
checklists-not-allowed: This page is not suitable for checklists. Common causes are that the page does not have wikitext content model or that is the page is not in a supported namespace
checklists-checkbox-dlg-hide-revision-la: Do not show this message again
